name_localized.en: City View King One Bedroom Suite Manhattan View
name_localized.es: City View King One Bedroom Suite Manhattan View

short_description_localized.en: Measuring 800 square feet, City View King One Bedroom Suites offer  four-fixture bathrooms, beautiful city views and quintessential Manhattan charm. These suites are situated on floors 5 to 20.

images.name: City-View-King-One-Bedroom-Suite-Manhattan-View--
images.alt:
This one-bedroom suite offers captivating views of New York City’s skyline. The suite offers an entry way with double door closet, a well-appointed living room featuring a comfortable sofa and coffee table overlooking the 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar. There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room. 
The comfortable bedroom features a king sized bed with an arm chair with side table on the far side of the room.  A night stand  with Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock is featured besides the bed.

The four fixture Turkish marble-clad bathroom features a glass enclosed shower, soaking tub with oversized shower heads, plush bathrobes, towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities.
